content: accessorize your pigeon this little pattern includes instructions on how to make a perfectly sized beret and baguette that allows you to french-a-frie my crochet pigeon pattern finished size if the recommended hook and yarn size are used the beret will be approximately 6 5 cm 2 5 inches in diameter and the baguette will be 10 5 cm 4 1 inches long difficulty level beginner skills needed crocheting in a round/spiral single_crochet increase and decrease stitches and ability to sew multiple pieces together pattern includes the pattern shows step by step instructions paired with photos and tutorial links for certain stitch techniques
